channel.title: Rs2 server 474
channel.description:
Since I see my work is being stolen on this site, I am going to post it on here also.
My name is Scu11, I'm a member of rune server, I hardly go on this site, but I see some people are stealing my work and crediting others.
Video of the combat from quite a while ago: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=PhmAvbYb55Y
All content can be seen on this thread -> [url=http://tinyurl.com/39rrugf]http://tinyurl.com/39rrugf[/url] (This links to rune server as I cannot be fucked to change all the tags to work on this site).
[url=http://uppit.com/zf9mwyhw6pz2/Rs2-Server_474.rar]UppIT - Free File hosting - google 474.rar[/url]
Also, not bothered on your comments about my code, as it's done better than the majority of this site.
[B]There are probably some bugs, as towards the end I started finding shit I'd done stupidly and noting them down, never got round to fixing them though.[/B]
Credits to me, vastico, graham, sir sean, scar.
[b]You will need a 474 cache to run this. It was designed in eclipse, and works best when ran in Eclipse. I will not fix any lib errors as I did not intend for this to be a 'download and host' server, rather a reference for people.[/b]
[b]The story[/b]
Well I sold this to Canownueasy for $500. He then added around 5hrs of content onto it, hosted it then released it under his alias, claiming that I used "Thing1s 474 as a base", and that he did the majority of the work. If you compare this server to Flaresoft 474, you will see the updates to this base were minimal. Also, I did not use thing1s 474 as a base. This is based off of hyperion, written by graham. With the help of vastico, my co-dev, we converted hyperion to 474, then worked off of it. Also, Canownueasy claims it has "shit combat" and an "awful cannon" etc. You will be the judges of that. I held a public beta in which we had nearly no negative feedback. There are about 5 bugs in the entire server at max, all of them can be fixed within about 30 minutes. Would someone really pay $500 for a server with shitty combat and awful features?

item.title: Rs2 server 474
item.dc:creator: @Canownueazy Canownueazy
item.description:
@Canownueazy wrote:

[quote=“mikescott, post:14, topic:377646”][quote author=Canownueazy link=topic=473538.msg3468712#msg3468712 date=1295131437]

I don’t program anymore, yet you try to prove your superiority by asking questions such as that, even though I have no interest in programming, therefore you are proving nothing. It’s not “running away”, it’s ignoring your ignorant questions that mean nothing to me.

Ignorance is a lack of willingness to learn, you are the ignorant one.

Why would I want to learn something that does not benefit me? That in itself is ignorance. Unless I wanted to make a career out of this it will not benefit me, and since I don’t, it would be stupid to continue learning it.
[/quote]You are ignorant in whole. Reread what you just said.

Why would I need to reread it. I know what I said and I’m right. Don’t be mad that you’re wrong.[/quote]This kid is so stupid I won’t even bother posting anymore

Read full topic

item.title: Rs2 server 474
item.dc:creator: @PLayRooney PLayRooney
item.description:
@PLayRooney wrote:

[quote=“mikescott, post:9, topic:377646”][quote author=Canownueazy link=topic=473538.msg3462894#msg3462894 date=1294668046]

Since I see my work is being stolen on this site, I am going to post it on here also.

My name is Scu11, I’m a member of rune server, I hardly go on this site, but I see some people are stealing my work and crediting others.

Video of the combat from quite a while ago: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=PhmAvbYb55Y

All content can be seen on this thread -> http://tinyurl.com/39rrugf (This links to rune server as I cannot be fucked to change all the tags to work on this site).

UppIT - Free File hosting - google 474.rar

Also, not bothered on your comments about my code, as it’s done better than the majority of this site.

There are probably some bugs, as towards the end I started finding shit I’d done stupidly and noting them down, never got round to fixing them though.

Credits to me, vastico, graham, sir sean, scar.

You will need a 474 cache to run this. It was designed in eclipse, and works best when ran in Eclipse. I will not fix any lib errors as I did not intend for this to be a ‘download and host’ server, rather a reference for people.

The story

Well I sold this to Canownueasy for $500. He then added around 5hrs of content onto it, hosted it then released it under his alias, claiming that I used “Thing1s 474 as a base”, and that he did the majority of the work. If you compare this server to Flaresoft 474, you will see the updates to this base were minimal. Also, I did not use thing1s 474 as a base. This is based off of hyperion, written by graham. With the help of vastico, my co-dev, we converted hyperion to 474, then worked off of it. Also, Canownueasy claims it has “shit combat” and an “awful cannon” etc. You will be the judges of that. I held a public beta in which we had nearly no negative feedback. There are about 5 bugs in the entire server at max, all of them can be fixed within about 30 minutes. Would someone really pay $500 for a server with shitty combat and awful features?
[/quote]Yeah I didn’t know it had bad combat

Anyway Thing1 told me you begged him for Hyperion 474

Oh yeah, and you run away when I ask you questions you don’t know

I swapped thing1 SH for hyperion 474. I did not use it, as you can see at the start of my project thread when I started from scratch. His server was shit, and I would never use it, I did however use it as a reference from some 474 packets.

Also, it does not have bad combat. It had about 5 bugs which were easily fixable, and even before that it was good combat (as you can test from this DL).

Also, you ask me stupid questions that have no relevance to my interests. You ask me about bitshifting, which I don’t care for. I don’t program anymore, yet you try to prove your superiority by asking questions such as that, even though I have no interest in programming, therefore you are proving nothing. It’s not “running away”, it’s ignoring your ignorant questions that mean nothing to me.

server is shit need more information only wildernes need skills info

Check the thread I linked for content herp derp. Also yes, it only have PVP and a few skills, it is a BASE to work off. Do you know what that means?[/quote]
Downed

Read full topic

item.title: Rs2 server 474
item.dc:creator: @mikescott mikescott
item.description:
@mikescott wrote:

Since I see my work is being stolen on this site, I am going to post it on here also.

My name is Scu11, I’m a member of rune server, I hardly go on this site, but I see some people are stealing my work and crediting others.

Video of the combat from quite a while ago: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=PhmAvbYb55Y

All content can be seen on this thread -> http://tinyurl.com/39rrugf (This links to rune server as I cannot be fucked to change all the tags to work on this site).

UppIT - Free File hosting - google 474.rar

Also, not bothered on your comments about my code, as it’s done better than the majority of this site.

There are probably some bugs, as towards the end I started finding shit I’d done stupidly and noting them down, never got round to fixing them though.

Credits to me, vastico, graham, sir sean, scar.

You will need a 474 cache to run this. It was designed in eclipse, and works best when ran in Eclipse. I will not fix any lib errors as I did not intend for this to be a ‘download and host’ server, rather a reference for people.

The story

Well I sold this to Canownueasy for $500. He then added around 5hrs of content onto it, hosted it then released it under his alias, claiming that I used “Thing1s 474 as a base”, and that he did the majority of the work. If you compare this server to Flaresoft 474, you will see the updates to this base were minimal. Also, I did not use thing1s 474 as a base. This is based off of hyperion, written by graham. With the help of vastico, my co-dev, we converted hyperion to 474, then worked off of it. Also, Canownueasy claims it has “shit combat” and an “awful cannon” etc. You will be the judges of that. I held a public beta in which we had nearly no negative feedback. There are about 5 bugs in the entire server at max, all of them can be fixed within about 30 minutes. Would someone really pay $500 for a server with shitty combat and awful features?

Read full topic
